main event: A round yellowish-white object, the size of a dime, was observed at a 45-degree elevation in the east on November 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as yellowish-white and round,It was noted to be stationary in the sky,The observer speculated that it was probably a balloon,The observation took place in El Paso, Texas,The report is part of the historical Project Blue Book investigation.
witness description: 22 years old, civilian from Texas Highway Department
